definition.name: RTMFP on Internet
definition.description: Assisted peer-to-peer connectivity using Rendezvous and RTMFP over the internet.

definition.name: RTMFP on LAN/WLAN
definition.description: Direct peer-to-peer connectivity using RTMFP on a LAN/Wireless LAN.
